Title: Breaking Point
Plot: The Vikings go all out for a second assault on Paris. Recognizing the desperate state of affairs for his city, Emperor Charles must make a difficult decision. In Wessex, Judith is compelled to make a difficult decision of her own.
ParentalRatingReason: Violence and content that may disturb.
GuestStars: Moe Dunford, Maude Hirst, Owen Roe, Jennie Jacques, Morgane Polanski
